content: the line on page 3 not right at the top the lines separate each version of the pattern p 6 & 7 chart legends the tc symbol in the legend is missing the second horizontal line the tc s in the actual charts are correct ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ errata for the nipigon or klamath border version thanks to kmdcrochet 11 row 15 refers to working into single_crochet stitches when previous row has esc… assuming this is a typo for row 16 work row 18 instructions esc worked flo row 17 should work into esc stitches not single_crochet row 19 should work into esc stitches not single_crochet row 23 should work in single_crochet stitches not esc skip single_crochet stitches not ch1 two row marked row 24 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/crochet-shoulder-wrappers/3006555/1-25 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/crochet-shoulder-wrappers 3 http //www ravelry com/groups/crochet-shoulder-wrappers 4 http //www ravelry com/people/korina 5 http //www ravelry com/people/tammysmom 6 http //www ravelry com/projects/mng/desperately-seeking-shallow-single_crochet-crescent-11 7 http //www ravelry com/projects/mng/desperate-old-shale 8 http //www ravelry com/projects/mng/desperately-seeking-shallow-single_crochet-crescent-9 9 http //www ravelry com/projects/mng/desperately-seeking-shallow-single_crochet-crescent-12 10 http //www ravelry com/projects/mng/desperately-seeking-shallow-single_crochet-crescent-5 11 http //www ravelry com/people/kmdcrochet
